TITLE: Victor Andres | Front-End
DESCRIPTION: Professional portfolio, I'm a front-end oriented software developer
NAME: Andres Barilin
SHORT-DESCRIPTION: I'm not another AI, I'm Andres Barilin, Front-End Specialist with +{years[03/01/2022]} years of experience. I focus on building fast, scalable, and high-quality web solutions

ABOUT-ME.TITLE: About Me
PARAGRAPHS: I specialize in building modern web experiences, focused on the user and optimized for performance.
Since I discovered web development, I've maintained a mindset of constant learning, always seeking new technologies and best practices to perfect every project I work on.
I enjoy collaborating in teams, sharing ideas, and transforming designs into solid, functional, and aesthetically pleasing interfaces.
Today I seek new challenges where I can contribute my knowledge, creativity, and passion for software development.

PROJECTS.TITLE: My Work
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: In this section you can find some of my work to learn more about me.
PROJECTS.BUCKEDUP-DESCRIPTION: This is my current job: the e-commerce site for a US-based company where I work as a Front-end developer. Among my achievements I can mention implementing complex designs, as well as optimizing the site's SEO and performance, achieving better search engine rankings.
PROJECTS.B-LARGE-DESCRIPTION: B-Large is an e-commerce site for Amazon affiliate products. In this personal project, I developed both the Front-end and Back-end, including a control panel. One of the main challenges was keeping products updated, so I implemented a scraper that automatically retrieves data, achieving much more efficient management.
PROJECTS.BLOG-DDV-DESCRIPTION: This is a personal project, a blog called 'Behind the Wheel' where you can find content related to the automotive world. In this project, I was responsible for developing both the front-end and back-end, plus an admin panel to manage content.

EXPERIENCE.TITLE: Experience
ARBOT: In this position I carried out work more related to robotics, performing tasks such as assembly and design of electronic boards, 3D design, and software development.
Although I didn't have the opportunity to use many web technologies, this job allowed me to solve various challenges logically.
It should be noted that this company no longer exists.
DEVIAS: This is my first job focused on web software development, where I gained a lot of experience supported by a good team.
I'm currently working at this company for more than {years[03/01/2022]} years.
Not only do I do web development, but I also had the opportunity to contribute to the development of a mobile application using React Native.

EDUCATION.TITLE: EDUCATION
EDUCATION.PLATZI: Platzi is a renowned online education platform where you'll find courses on various topics, with my focus being on web development.
EDUCATION.ITEC: iTec is a tertiary-level educational institute where I studied software development. After 2 years of study, I decided to leave to become self-taught, as I noticed better progress with that approach.
EDUCATION.GOOGLE: On these platforms I stay up to date with the world of technology, and like every developer, I also quickly search for information when solving problems.

TALK-TO-ME.TITLE: Talk to me!
TEXT: Hello! If you've made it this far, we probably have something interesting to talk about.
I'm always open to new connections, exciting ideas, and collaboration opportunities.
If you have a project that sparks curiosity or just want to chat about the latest tech gadget or your favorite rock music, I'm here! Feel free to send a message and let's make things happen.

FOOTER.RIGHT: Project made with Astro and Tailwind
